price: And if they argue with you, say, “Allah knows best what you are doing.”
arabic: وَإِن جَٰدَلُوكَ فَقُلِ ٱللَّهُ أَعۡلَمُ بِمَا تَعۡمَلُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
